name: Speed-E Scan
description:
Speeds up the platter safely while scanning.
The box claims it can speed up the scan by up to 10% and is legitimate.

name: Sector Slapper
description:
New from MichaelSoft, this magical piece of hardware will slap bad sectors in to place and can make a bad sector be good.
Unfortunately some reviewers say it can just cause more bad sectors and you won't get your money back.

name: Online Scanning
description: Allows users to access their data during a scanning operation for 5 minutes. Reduces scan rate but allows business profit loss to decrease momentarily depending on how much data has been scanned.

name: XTREME OV3RCLOCK
description: Speeds up scan by a large factor for 1 minute. Increased chance of corruption during operation.
